story_text: Shelly the sheep loves to sit by the shiny shore and watch the ships sail.
One day, Shelly found a shell with shimmering shapes on the sand.
story_images: A fluffy sheep named Shelly sitting happily near a bright, sunlit shore, with several colorful ships sailing in the background.
Shelly the sheep examining a beautiful shell with shimmering shapes on a sandy beach, with the ocean in the background.

questions.question: Where does Shelly the sheep love to sit?
What did Shelly find on the sand?
